p: Poliomyelitis is a disease that has been plaguing humanity for centuries, its first clinical description dates from 1789, being that only in 1955 the first vaccine was developed ( 49). Children are the most affected by this disease, which can affect the nervous system and cause paralysis. Nowadays, it is endemic in areas of Afghanistan and Pakistan, and in the period of 10 years, 200,000 new cases were observed, probably due to failures in strategic actions implementation, leading to a high transmission of this virus ( 34).
